thread.title: John I

author: John I
title: John I
text:
Ryan turned up nicely early on a Sunday morning. Gave me a warning 10 mins prior to his arrival. Tyre beyond repair as the puncture near the tyre wall so replaced. A very very nice man üëçSecond time I've used TOTD and will continue to do so, no more hanging around in tyre parlours. Prices comparable if not better.
Would not hesitate to recommend them. Top Notch.
